item.title: dix marie add a quote by M.T.
item.description: "I think resentment is when you take the poison and wait for the other person to die" -- M.T.

item.title: dix marie add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Hold everything in your hands lightly, otherwise it hurts when God pries your fingers open." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: dix marie add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "It is dangerous to be right in matters on which the established authorities are wrong." -- Voltaire

item.title: dix marie add a quote by Blaise Pascal
item.description: "Men never do evil so completely and cheerfully as when they do it from religious conviction." -- Blaise Pascal

item.title: dix marie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "A good friend will always stab you in the front." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: dix marie add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Until the great mass of the people shall be filled with the sense of responsibility for each others welfare, social justice can never be attained." -- Helen Keller

item.title: dix marie add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "I like to have a martini, Two at the very most. After three I'm under the table, after four I'm under my host." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: dix marie add a quote by Tallulah Bankhead
item.description: "My father warned me about men and booze but he never said anything about women and cocaine." -- Tallulah Bankhead

item.title: dix marie add a quote by Dorothy Allison
item.description: "The horror of class stratification, racism, and prejudice is that some people begin to believe that the security of their families and communities depends on the oppression of others, that for some to have good lives there must be others whose lives are truncated and brutal." -- Dorothy Allison

item.title: dix marie add a quote by Eugene V. Debs
item.description: "While there is a lower class, I am in it, while there is a criminal element, I am of it, and while there is a soul in prison, I am not free." -- Eugene V. Debs

item.title: dix marie add a quote by Lenny Bruce
item.description: "If you can't say "Fuck" you can't say, "Fuck the government." -- Lenny Bruce
